title: What does the X over a players icon post game mean?
body: After the match the other brand I played had a x over his name  in overview screen and I was unable to give him honor, gifts, etc. Just curious, couldn't find anything online.

replies.body: I think Jack is onto something actually. I do believe that 'X' means that the player was flagged as AFK sometime during the match, or that they were no longer in the lobby.
I think it means that they were afk, so you can only report them, nothing else
I dont think it was that, we were laning against each other all game and he was there when we destroyed the nexus.
